quest.name: A Hearer Is Often Late
journal: Lothaire, a guard at Galvanth's Spire, wants you to visit the Hedgetree.
Lothaire has asked that you remind Hearer Leonnie that she has booked passage on a vessel at the Mirror Planks. Head to the Hedgetree to the southwest and speak with the conjurer.
Hearer Leonnie must remain at the Hedgetree to commune with the elementals. Inform Armelle at the Mirror Planks of the delay to the conjurer's plans.
You convey Hearer Leonnie's message to Armelle, who resigns herself to booking the conjurer passage on a later vessel. The only issue remaining is to decide how much later...
objectives: Speak with Armelle at the Mirror Planks.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

dialogue.name: LOTHAIRE
dialogue.text: I have another task for you, adventurer. I need you to head to the Hedgetree to the southwest of here and speak with Hearer Leonnie.

dialogue.name: LOTHAIRE
dialogue.text: After tending to the Hedgetree, the Hearer was scheduled to board a boat from the Mirror Planks... Well, the vessel's departure time has come and gone, but there is still no sign of her.

dialogue.name: LOTHAIRE
dialogue.text: Knowing how absorbed the Hearer becomes in her work, I am not unduly concerned. Armelle, however, was responsible for organizing Leonnie's transportation and is likely wondering if her wayward passenger is ever going to arrive. Perhaps a gentle reminder is in order?

dialogue.name: LEONNIE
dialogue.text: Yes, what troubles you, my de─? Ah. Yes. The boat. I had quite forgotten.

dialogue.name: LEONNIE
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh, my task with the Hedgetree is well and finished, but the elementals murmur of a malevolent presence in the vicinity of the Tam–Tara Deepcroft.

dialogue.name: LEONNIE
dialogue.text: I must abide a while longer, that I might better divine the source of the elementals' distress. Please inform Armelle that I shall be late in arriving.

dialogue.name: ARMELLE
dialogue.text: You bear a message from Hearer Leonnie? An evil presence in the Deepcroft? That does sound grave, indeed.

dialogue.name: ARMELLE
dialogue.text: I shall organize a vessel for a later time, then. Perhaps a bell from now? Two? Better make it three, just to be safe. Thank you for your trouble.

dialogue.name: LEONNIE
dialogue.text: I must linger here a while longer. Please head to the Mirror Planks and convey my apologies to Armelle.
